New Records: India won their tenth successive T20I win.
Pre-Game Insights: Wasim Jaffer predicted Sri Lanka spinners to cause India problems
Ishan Kishan mentioned that India's approach is to attack the bowlers rather than wait for a bad ball
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma praised Ishan Kishan's performance and mentioned that Jadeja is in good form and might be promoted up the order
Dasun Shanaka said that Sri Lanka were poor in all three departments and that Asalanka carried his form throughout the series
Miscellaneous Highlights: India took a 1-0 lead in the series
Sri Lanka lost a wicket off the first ball of their innings and were five down by the 12th over
India didn't use their main bowlers for quite some time and gave a few overs to Deepak Hooda and Venkatesh Iyer
